page.title: 12Remembrance Sunday
page.content:
For Remembrance Sunday in November, the Cubs, Scouts, Guides and Brownies march with other bodies through Buntingford to St. Peter's Church for a service. Outside, a wreath of poppies is laid at the cross to remember all the people who died in the World Wars.
Open Air service at Layston
Once a year there is an open air service at Layston Church. Sometimes, children take their pets along, like cats, dogs, guinea pigs, rabbits, pigs, etc. They are blessed by the Rev. Moore.
Layston Church is in need of complete rebuilding before it can be used for services. The Friends of Layston raise money for its repair.
